main event: On 5 July 1949, at approximately 2100 hours, Mrs. [redacted] observed a round object with a luminous center in Alexandria, Louisiana.
interesting points: The object was described as light in color with a bright yellow luminous center., It was estimated to be approximately the size of an automobile wheel., The object traveled in a straight, horizontal line at a speed comparable to a balloon., The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds before the object disappeared behind trees and a building., No physical evidence or photographs were captured during the observation.
witness description: Mrs. [redacted], housewife and study and research of French history
